The VC Corner

February 2025 Startups Raising Capital

A curated list of 197 startups actively fundraising

Ruben Dominguez
and
Luis Llorens
Mar 12, 2025
28
7
Share

Raising capital in 2025 remains a challenge. Investors are more selective, rounds take longer, and competition is fierce. But great startups can still get funded if they know where to look.

That’s why

Luis Llorens
and I are sharing February’s fundraising list—a curated selection of 197 startups that are actively raising capital. Whether you’re a founder looking for investor exposure or an investor searching for high-potential deals, this is where you should be looking.

Brought to you by Vanta

Founders: This is how you maintain energy and avoid burnout

Join Dan Murray-Serter, founder of Heights and host of the

Secret Leaders podcast, and Vanta, the leading trust management platform, for a virtual event on 19 March on how founders can maintain energy and avoid burnout. Learn key strategies to stay energised and reach your full potential.

February’s Fundraising Snapshot

📊 Funding Stage Breakdown

  • 5% Stealth

  • 55% Pre-Seed

  • 33% Seed

  • 6% Series A

  • 1% Series B & C

🌍 Where Are These Startups Based?

  • 40% United States

  • 9% United Kingdom

  • 5% Spain

  • 46% Rest of the World

📂 What’s Inside the Fundraising List?

For each startup, we provide:

✅ Startup Name
✅ Website
✅ Country
✅ Sector
✅ Stage
✅ E-mail Address
✅ LinkedIn Profile
✅ Investment Deck
